AMS Student Nest, 6133 University Blvd, UBC, Vancouver, BC V6T 1Z1

articles.title: SynBio6.0
articles.description:
**6th Annual Synthetic Biology Symposium**  
May 16-17, 2024, Vancouver, BC, Canada
articles.contents:
SynBio6.0 (May 16-17, 2024) aims to bring the research community together to celebrate Canadian progress in this exciting and fast-growing field. The goal of this event it to promote collaborations and the exchange of ideas between synthetic biology research groups in Canada.

Find the conference abstract book  here.

Keynote Speakers



Leopold Parts

Group Lead

Wellcome Sanger Institute



Pulin Li

Professor

Whitehead Institute, MIT



Rebecca Shapiro

Associate Professor

University of Guelph



Ron Weiss

Professor

MIT


This event provides a forum for our trainees to develop their skills in the science and business of synthetic biology. Trainees are invited to attend tutorial workshops, participate in discussion of synthetic biology training programs, to present their work through oral and poster presentations, and to network with other synbio researchers.



Register and Present →



Important Dates


Date
Registration Opens
February 12th 2024
Registration Ends
May 9th 2024
Abstract Submission Deadline
April 26th 2024
Conference
May 16th - May 17th 2024

Venue
AMS Student Nest, 6133 University Blvd, UBC, Vancouver, BC V6T 1Z1

articles.title: Registration
articles.contents:
Join us for Synbio 6.0 by securing your spot today. The registration fee of 210 CAD provides you with full access to the conference sessions, materials, networking and meals.


Register now at

this link





Important Dates


Date
Registration Opens
February 12th 2024
Registration Ends
May 9th 2024
Abstract Submission Deadline
April 26th 2024
Conference
May 16th - May 17th 2024

Abstract Submission:

Abstract submission is now closed

Accomodation:
Attendees can reserve their stay on UBC campus here. Rooms on campus fill up faster during this season, so we recommend reserving your accomodation as soon as you register.
Cancellation Policy
Attendees can get a full refund if they cancel over 60 days before the conference. Cancellations made between 30 to 60 days prior are eligible for a 50% refund. No refunds are provided for cancellations within 30 days of the event. All cancellation refunds incur a 35 CAD administrative charge.
